# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_SHUNT_ON_STICK

## Summary
Sets vehicle shunt to be on the left stick, this also enables forwards shunting

## Parameters
* **BOOL** shuntOnStick

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Does nothing. It's a nullsub.
